sentence.Network_en: She disembarrassed an old gentlemen of an empty cup at the teaparty.
sentence.Network_cn: 在茶会上,她使一位老先生免受杯中空空的窘境.

sentence.Network_en: The school wishes to be disembarrassed of the troublesome boy.
sentence.Network_cn: 校方希望摆脱这个惹事生非的孩子.

sentence.Network_en: He disembarrassed his friend of the trouble of lack of ready money.
sentence.Network_cn: 他使他朋友摆脱了缺少现金的困境.
